bodydiv.p: If, and only if, it is impracticable for an entity to apply paragraph C3 for a group of insurance contracts, an entity shall apply the following approaches instead of applying paragraph C4(a):

li.p: the modified retrospective approach in paragraphs C6–C19A, subject to paragraph C6(a); or
the fair value approach in paragraphs C20–C24B.
